name: politico
text:
Senate Dems are split on what to do about GOP senators' police reform plan.

They can either block the plan and face charges of obstruction amid a national reckoning on race ‚Äî or advance a bill that they say needs major changes in order to meet the moment

text:
The Small Business Administration is illegally stonewalling Congress' watchdog agency from reviewing its handling of a massive coronavirus relief program, House Democrats alleged today

name: politico
text:
The House Judiciary Committee advanced a sweeping police reform bill in response to nationwide fury over the death of George Floyd at the hands of police. 

No Republicans voted for the bill
https://t.co/XIzOXDp5B4

name: politico
text:
The House Judiciary Committee just approved a major police reform bill on a party-line vote.

Yet for much of the day, the panel was ensnared in acrimonious cultural and political quarrels that had little to do with the underlying issue of police brutality
https://t.co/hvXK6RogxE
